webinars.title: Eyes on Emissions: Monitoring CO2 Across the CCUS Value Chain
webinars.excrept: In the global effort to combat climate change, Carbon Capture, Utilization, and Storage (CCUS) plays a pivotal role. Ensuring precise CO2 emissions monitoring across the CCUS value chain is crucial for operational efficiency, regulatory compliance, and environmental safety.

seo.metaTitle: Eyes on Emissions: Monitoring CO2 Across the CCUS
seo.metaDescription: In the global effort to combat climate change, Carbon Capture, Utilization, and Storage (CCUS) plays a pivotal role.

content.content:
In the global effort to combat climate change, Carbon Capture, Utilization, and Storage (CCUS) plays a pivotal role. Ensuring precise CO2 emissions monitoring across the CCUS value chain is crucial for operational efficiency, regulatory compliance, and environmental safety.

FutureBridge hosted an exclusive webinar in collaboration with Oliver Bornholdt from Dr√§ger to highlight advanced CO2 monitoring and detection technologies and practical strategies for seamless integration with various real-word applications.

What we covered in this webinar:

  • Innovations in flow rate, phase and pressure measurement, and leakage detection.
  • Practical approaches for incorporating advanced monitoring systems into existing infrastructures to enhance efficiency and compliance.
  • Real-world applications, challenges, and success stories in the CCUS sector.
